Message.Title: To See Why Ebay Can't Stay At $50 Look At Tool Fencer z50com And All The Chinese Junk!
Message.Msg: A simple look at tool fencing (and failing) "z50com" and the pages and pages and pages of refurbs, factory seconds, replicas and Chinese cast off junk, shows why it's a total scam having ebay near $50. Ebay is NOT a go to site anymore. This price lecel is not based off the failing ebay market share.

Topic.Title: To See Why Ebay Can't Stay At $50 Look At Tool Fencer z50com And All The Chinese Junk!

Message.Msg: You would think that scammer z50com, my g@y broke failed Daddy failed Grand Daddy, known here as Johns_Joint, would keep quieter over shame than be here every day 247 as a 12 year long board troll. Go figure.
